name: SurgeryDigestiveSystemBiliaryTract
title: Surgery Digestive System Biliary Tract
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains HCPCS codes associated with Surgery Digestive System Biliary Tract.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients with Surgery Digestive System Biliary Tract.),(Inclusion Criteria: HCPCS codes associated with Surgery Digestive System Biliary Tract are included in this value set.),(Exclusion Criteria: Codes not associated with Surgery Digestive System Biliary Tract are excluded from this value set. Codes captured in systems other than HCPCS are also excluded from the value set.)
